title: Achievement Goal Setting and Coping Strategy Development in Inquiry-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Scientific Inquiry Methods and Experience with Mobile Learning Tools
context.additional_context: Learners possess beginner-level expertise in science and are required to engage in self-directed inquiry using mobile devices. The course emphasizes summative assessment but provides formative feedback during the process

learning_goals: Learners can clearly set personal achievement goals during inquiry-based learning and develop specific action plans to achieve them.
Learners can select and apply situational coping strategies (cognitive/motivational) for problems encountered during inquiry activities.
Learners can improve the inquiry process through peer collaboration and revise strategies based on feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
